class.name: RetryRunner

javadoc.text: A test runner that retries tests when assertions fail.

javadoc.throws: InitializationError if default runner cannot be built.

method.name: methodInvoker

javadoc.text: Evaluate the statement. * We attempt several runs for the test, at most MAX_ATTEMPTS. * if one attempt succeeds, we succeed, if all attempts fail, we * fail with the reason corresponding to the last attempt

method.comment: Do a single test run attempt.
Do a single test run attempt.
